MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L35 Prescot and WA8 Widnes, affecting properties in Cronton Road, Garnetts Lane, Stockswell Road and surrounding streets.Our engineers on site are continuing to work on the repairs to the overhead lines near Lodge Lane. We now expect the power to be restored by 1.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.05pm on 16th of January 2021.
